page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5ws_LockOutUserRelease(C UserValue [,* NotUsed ])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The User ID was released. .F. = The User ID was not released.

page.description: Web Security - Release the User Value if it is currently locked
page.discussion: The A5WS_LockOutUserRelease() function releases a locked User Value. If the function finds no match in the locked out list, nothing happens.

section.title: Example
section.description: If a user with the user value of "joe@email.com" is locked out, this will release the lock.
